title: London Airbnb Dynamic Pricing
subtitle: Revenue Optimization Product
vision: To democratize institutional-grade revenue management for independent Airbnb hosts, enabling them to maximize earnings without data science expertise.
problem: Independent hosts lose 15-20% potential revenue due to static pricing. They lack the tools to react to seasonality, local demand spikes, and lead-time booking behaviors.
solution: Defined the product roadmap for an AI-powered pricing engine. Led the end-to-end development of a Streamlit MVP that utilizes LightGBM to predict booking probabilities. Validated the feature set through competitor analysis of existing property management systems.
impact: Delivered a functional MVP capable of generating a 15-20% projected revenue uplift for hosts. SHAP analysis confirmed feature interpretability, directly addressing user trust barriers.

title: Brain Tumor AI Assistant
subtitle: Clinical Workflow Optimization
vision: To reduce radiologist burnout and diagnostic delays by automating repetitive image segmentation tasks.
problem: Manual tumor segmentation takes 20-40 minutes per scan, creating a critical bottleneck in cancer treatment planning. Existing automated tools lacked a user-friendly interface for validation.
solution: Managed the product lifecycle of a 'Human-in-the-Loop' diagnostic tool. Prioritized a U-Net model backend with a simplified front-end (Streamlit) that allows clinicians to review and adjust masks, balancing automation with medical oversight.
impact: Achieved a 90% reduction in segmentation time (from mins to seconds) in testing. Validated the UX with non-technical stakeholders to ensure clinical adoptability.

title: Covid-19 Resource Planner
subtitle: Public Health Decision Support System
vision: To enable proactive resource allocation for regional health authorities in data-scarce environments.
problem: Regional policymakers in Zambia were reacting to infection waves rather than preventing them due to a lack of granular, forward-looking data.
solution: Conducted stakeholder analysis to identify key KPIs (oxygen supply, bed capacity). Developed a forecasting dashboard that synthesized complex time-series data into actionable 'Early Warning' signals for logistics teams.
impact: Delivered a high-utility MVP under urgent timelines. The tool bridged the gap between raw epidemiological data and actionable logistics strategy, facilitating better resource distribution.
